frontmatter.title: App's Features
frontmatter.subTitle: List of features that might help you be more productive and effective.

featureList.heading: Always On Top
featureList.description: If enabled, the app will always on top of other apps running on user's Operating System.

featureList.heading: Full Screen Breaks
featureList.description: If enabled, the app will interrupt the user by occupying the whole screen so that the user will be force to take a break.

featureList.heading: Strict Mode
featureList.description: If enabled, the app will strictly follow user's configuration and prevent the user from resetting, pausing and skipping the timer when it has started.

featureList.heading: Dark Theme
featureList.description: Allowing the user to use Dark Mode to reduce eye strain and improves visibility for user with low vision and those who are sensitive to bright light.

featureList.heading: Toggle Native Titlebar
featureList.description: Allowing the user to switch between default custom titlebar to a native one and vice versa. This feature is useful for some users especially to those who don't like the default custom titlebar.

featureList.heading: Timer Animation
featureList.description: Allowing the user to disable timer progress animation to reduce the CPU usage to the app least required. It is really useful for some people.

featureList.heading: Desktop Notification
featureList.description: If enabled, the app will allow the user to be notified from time to time. Notification property is divided into 3 types NONE, NORMAL and EXTRA.

featureList.heading: Special Breaks
featureList.description: If enabled, the user will be allowed to set some special time when the user really need to take a break.

featureList.heading: Auto-Start Work Time
featureList.description: If enabled, the app will automatically start after the timer ends. It is useful when the user did not want to always start the timer manually from time to time.

featureList.heading: Minimize to Tray
featureList.description: If enabled, clicking the minimize button will not minimize the app. It will be hidden and being send to Tray instead of minimizing on the Taskbar.

featureList.heading: Close to Tray
featureList.description: If enabled, clicking the close button will not quit the app. It will be hidden and being send to Tray instead of closing and quitting the app.

featureList.heading: Progress on Tray
featureList.description: The app will show progress animation on tray. This feature can be activate if Minimize to Tray of Close to Tray is enabled. Useful when the timer is being hidden.

featureList.heading: Keyboard Shortcuts
featureList.description: Provide some useful keyboard shortcuts allowing the user to use the app conveniently.

featureList.heading: Customizable Rules
featureList.description: Allowing the user to modify the default rules of Pomodoro Principle to fit on their personal preference.

featureList.heading: Built-in Task List
featureList.description: Allowing the user to create tasks they wanted to accomplish and enable them to mark a particular task as done showing some accomplishments.

featureList.heading: Auto Updates
featureList.description: With the Automatic Updates feature, it keep the app up to date with the latest updates and enhancements. User no longer have to search for critical updates; it delivers them directly to the computer.
